description:
An traditional longsword with a wide blade.
[Range 1]
name: Broadsword

description:
A single-edged sword with a short blade. Emphasis is placed on handling rather than power.
[Range 1] [Hit + 5%]
name: Falchion

description:
A crimson longsword created by a famous blacksmith.
[Range 1]
name: The Great Sword Rose Grim

description:
Steel combat axe. Has high attack power, but reduces agility.
[Range 1]
name: Iron Axe

description:
A small axe for throwing. Easy to handle and preferred on the battlefield.
[Range 1]
name: Francesca

description:
A huge battle axe that tears even the scales of a dragon in exchange for its weight.
[Range 1]
name: Dragon Killer

description:
A wand for wizards made from oak trees. For magical combat.
[Range 1] [No counterattack]
name: Maple Rod

description:
A pure white wand that allows you to use ice magic.
[Range 1]
name: Ice Wand

description:
味方単体の傷を癒す魔法の杖。通常攻撃は出来ない。
【ヒール発動】【射程 3】【反撃不可】
name: Silver Healing Wand

description:
General longbow. The attack power and range are well balanced.
[Range 2-4]
name: Long Bow

description:
A small bow for hunting. It is made to be easy to handle in the woods.
[Range 1-3] [Hit + 10%]
name: Hunting Bow

description:
A large battle bow carved with the dragon coat of arms. High attack power and long range.
[Range 3-5]
name: Dragon Bow Granada

description:
A long spear that many people love. A weapon with a long range.
[Range 2]
name: Long Spear

description:
A short spear that can be swung quickly. Good at attacking with effort.
[Range 2]
name: Stinger

description:
A magical spear that wears the magical power of fire. Has high attack power.
[Range 2-3
name: Flame Spear Eflze
